title: 2011 MQ Whiteman MLT Hydrogen Gas Refueling Trailer And Accessories

Note: Bill of Sale only. The item is not titled or registered with CA DMV. Buyer is fully responsible for the new registration process, transfer, fees, application for new license plates, and inspections due to DMV to register this item in the Buyer's name if they so choose to obtain a new title/VIN/License/registration.
